channel.title: Alright I added these items
channel.description:
Already got Rune C'bow recognised along with d bolts (e) and the animations, but whats wrong is that the Cbow can shoot without the bolts, and if you do have bolts in the arrow slot, they do not leave after you shoot, like you could have one bolt and it shoots 100 - infinite amount of times...so
Can you help me figure out how too make dbolts shoot like arrows, and make cbow not fire if theres no bolts.?

item.title: Alright I added these items
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

yeah…but like…ages ago…i already had rune crossbow but it was some diff id and return 427[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2008, 03:00:00 PM[/size][hr]client.java:25730: ‘)’ expected
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13800 // rune crossbow
^

item.title: Alright I added these items
item.dc:creator: @99_Clovers 99_Clovers
item.description:
@99_Clovers wrote:

yea go too client.java search for

if(id == 4734 || id == 837) // karils x bow
{
return 2077;

after you find it put this under it:

if(id == 13800 || id == 837) // rune cbow
{
return 2077;

then go to your item.cfg and put:

item = 13800 Rune_Cbow A_Rune_Cbow. 88.2105575155 80.2105575155 1320.3495290539 0 0 0 0 150 0 0 0 0 0 145 0

well in that order lol it should straighten out but then you have a rune cbow that has correct emote…thats simple version. I have the actual animation but Im keeping it to myself

Read full topic
